text: David Andrew Roy White is an American actor, movie director, screenwriter, movie producer and businessman. He is a co-founder of Pinnacle Peak Pictures. He is best known for his role as Reverend Dave in the God's Not Dead movie series. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American Evangelicals Category:Actors from Kansas Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles Category:Screenwriters from Los Angeles Category:Businesspeople from Kansas Category:Writers from Kansas Category:People from Dodge City, Kansas
title: David A. R. White
